front.title: •IG-88's Pulse Cannon
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on IG-88, 4 on your other warrior. Adds 2 to power. May target X non-droid characters or creatures using X Force. Draw destiny for each. If destiny = 0, character is power -1 and forfeit -1 until end of turn. If destiny -1 > defense value, target hit.
front.lore: IG-88's personal favorite for mass destruction. Rapid-fire fusion plasma bursts are extremely effective against multiple targets. Not widely used due to incidental damage.
